dataList.content: Another veteran appeared in the dark, carrying a depressed aura.
His sparkling old badge seemed to signify a high rank once held.
I think I remember that face of yours. But why?

dataList.title: G Corp. Remnant
dataList.content: …I was the head manager of your team.

dataList.title: G Corp. Remnant
dataList.content: Not only did you desert us, you now have the audacity to take the lives of your old comrades—my subordinates.
Look, the war ended a decade ago. But, I guess some folks still haven’t let go of their obsolete ranks, huh?

dataList.title: G Corp. Remnant
dataList.content: The war may have been over for you when you deserted G Corp…

dataList.title: G Corp. Remnant
dataList.content: But we’re fighting for our lives on the battlefield to this day.
As much as I didn’t want to relate to you this way…
I’m not really that different here.

dataList.title: G Corp. Remnant
dataList.content: Then you ought to understand, Gregor.

dataList.title: G Corp. Remnant
dataList.content: There is only one verdict that awaits deserters.
You say that like it means something… But it’s against company policy to carry out summary execution for personal revenge, my Head Manager.
